columns.name: _inPiece
columns.description: Reference to the Piece this Item or Piece is contained in

columns.name: _ofShipment
columns.description: Reference to the Shipment the Piece is assigned to

columns.name: _packagingType
columns.description: Packaging details

columns.name: _associatedEpermit
columns.description: Reference to the permits associated with the Live Animals

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _externalReferences
columns.description: References to all associated ExternalReferences

columns.name: _attachedIotDevices
columns.description: References to all connected IotDevices

columns.name: _containedItems
columns.description: Reference to the item(s) contained in the piece

columns.name: _containedPieces
columns.description: Details of contained piece(s)

columns.name: _contentProductionCountry
columns.description: Goods production country; mandatory when there are no Items. Refer ISO 3166-2

columns.name: _contentProducts
columns.description: Reference to the Products describing the content of the Piece; mandatory if no data on Item level is used

columns.name: _customsInformation
columns.description: Customs details

columns.name: _dimensions
columns.description: Dimensions details

columns.name: _fulfillsUldTypeCode
columns.description: Text holding an ULD Type Code if the Piece fulfills it before UnitComposition

columns.name: _grossWeight
columns.description: Weight details

columns.name: _loadType
columns.description: Load type of the shipment or piece (Bulk; ULD; Pallet; Loose)

columns.name: _packageMarkCoded
columns.description: Reference identifying how the package is marked. Field is hardcode to SSCC-18; UPC or Other

columns.name: _securityDeclarations
columns.description: Security details of the piece

columns.name: _temperatureInstructions
columns.description: Temperature instructions if a specific range

columns.name: _volumetricWeight
columns.description: Volumetric weight details

columns.name: _exportTradeCountry
columns.description: Country of last re-export (box 12a). Refer ISO 3166-2

columns.name: _goodsTypeCode
columns.description: Appendix number of the convention (I; II or III) (box 1)

columns.name: _goodsTypeExtensionCode
columns.description: Appendix number of the convention (I; II or III) (box 1)

columns.name: _originReferencePermitTypeCode
columns.description: Document type code of origin reference permit or re-export reference Certificate (box 12/12a)

columns.name: _originTradeCountry
columns.description: country of origin (box 12). Refer ISO 3166-2

columns.name: _specimenTypeCode
columns.description: Description of specimens; CITES type code (box 9)

columns.name: _events
columns.description: Events object

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: _involvedInActions
columns.description: References to the Actions the object is involved in

columns.name: _involvedParties
columns.description: Information about other Parties involved depending on the context of use

columns.name: _otherIdentifiers
columns.description: Details about any other identifier; depending on the context of use

columns.name: _specialHandlingCodes
columns.description: Three-letter special handling code (SPH)

columns.name: _coload
columns.description: Coload indicator for the pieces (boolean)

columns.name: _goodsDescription
columns.description: Description of goods; for the BookingShipment the commodity list defined by Modernizing Cargo Distribution MCD working group can be used as a referential.

columns.name: _nvdForCarriage
columns.description: When no value is declared for Carriage; this field may be completed with the value TRUE otherwise FALSE

columns.name: _nvdForCustoms
columns.description: When no value is declared for Customs; this field may be completed with the value TRUE otherwise FALSE

columns.name: _packagedeIdentifier
columns.description: SSCC-18 code for the value of the package mark; company or bar code; free text; pallet code; etc.

columns.name: _slac
columns.description: Shipper's Load And Count  ( total contained piece count as provided by shipper)

columns.name: _stackable
columns.description: Stackable indicator for the pieces (boolean)

columns.name: _turnable
columns.description: Turnable indicator for the pieces (boolean)

columns.name: _upid
columns.description: Unique Piece Identifier (UPID) of the piece. Refer IATA Recommended Practice 1689

columns.name: _acquisitionDateTime
columns.description: Defined in Resolution Conf. 13.6 and is required for pre-Convention specimens (box 12b)

columns.name: _annualQuotaQuantity
columns.description: total number of specimens exported in the current calendar year and the current annuela quota for the species concerned (box 11a)

columns.name: _originReferencePermitDateTime
columns.description: Issuing date for Origin reference permit or re-export reference Certificate (box 12)

columns.name: _originReferencePermitId
columns.description: identifier of Origin reference permit or re-export reference Certificate (box 12/12a)

columns.name: _quantityAnimals
columns.description: Quantity including units (box 11)

columns.name: _specimenDescription
columns.description: Description of specimens; including age and sex if LA (box 9)

columns.name: _shippingMarks
columns.description: Shipping marks

columns.name: _textualHandlingInstructions
columns.description: Strings to provide free text handling instructions such as SSR and OSI

columns.name: _categoryCode
columns.description: Operations code ID. Refers to the number of the registered captive-breeding or artifical propagation operation (box 12b)

columns.name: _speciesCommonName
columns.description: Species common name (box 8)

columns.name: _speciesScientificName
columns.description: Species scientific name (box 7)
